Description: Body sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery kernos with part of foot and one vessel holder; white slip; interior: reserved with fugitive black glaze; exterior: on top, large black crossed square and black around vessel holder; on outside edge, guilloche; underside and top of foot reserved.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by University College London. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 250, no. 363, pl. 52. no. 363)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.2185) (phase 2)
